adDetails: Offering a very clean, bright and well equipped professional conference room for rent by the hour/day/other flexible terms. Our conference rooms comes with projectors, executive chairs, boards, wifi, coffee, professional ambiance and much more to make your meeting/training a successful one. We have very flexible schedule and will work with you to meet your needs and get you started very easily. We have two conference rooms and the large one accommodates 16 people comfortably, but can add more chairs if needed. Our small conference room accommodates up to 8 people, while the training room can host upto 15 people. Call show contact info to get more info.
